overview: Jorden is an outsider in a small, ever-snowing town who observes random people as his strange way of social interaction. One day, during one of his observational outings, a woman named Rose strikes up a conversation with him like he's never had before and his lonesome life seems to turn a new leaf. In this twisted romance short film, similar to Eternal Sunshine of the Spotless Mind and 500 Days of Summer, Jorden and Rose play a game of "cat and mouse" to see if a blossoming romance or a doomed disaster is in store.
title: Mr. What's It To Ya
